collaboration.1: Rate each user based on how much collaborative they were.
collaboration.2: In your opinion, who has influenced your preferences the most?
collaboration.3: My friendship with another user in the room affected my decisions.
collaboration.4: I judged the user that influenced me the most by his room interactions.

satisfaction.1: The interface provides a suitable way for me to express my preferences.
satisfaction.2: The recommendation interface provides sufficient information.
satisfaction.3: I quickly got used to the recommendation system.
satisfaction.4: It is easy for me to inform the system how much I like the items that are displayed for me.
satisfaction.5: The interface makes it easy for me to know what other members are doing all the time.
satisfaction.6: The recommendations I paid the most attention to were in:

item.title: In your opinion, how would you rate this recommended item?
